overview: Dream Kitchen is a tale about isolation and lack of communication, the gap between the reality a young teenage boy lives, and how he would like it be. He has a secret that he would like to tell his family, something that he has come to terms with and is about to effect the rest of his life - but how will they react - they'll bloody kill him!

title: Dream Kitchen
